Mask module¶

Mask.Bad_Pixel_Mask(IMG, results, options)[source]¶

construct a mask by identifying bad pixels as selected by basic cutoff criteria.

Mask.Mask_Segmentation_Map(IMG, results, options)[source]¶
Mask.Star_Mask(IMG, results, options)[source]¶

Idenitfy the location of stars in the image and create a mask around each star of pixels to be avoided in further processing.

Mask.Star_Mask_IRAF(IMG, results, options)[source]¶

Idenitfy the location of stars in the image and create a mask around each star of pixels to be avoided in further processing.
